CLIMATE CHANGE, DONE DIFFERENTLY.​​

CLEVERCOW IS HELPING TO TACKLE TWO OF THE BIGGEST CHALLENGES FACING OUR WORLD ​

feeding the world and addressing climate change. And our farmers holder the key. ​​

HOW DOES IT WORK?​​ ​

We help farmers adopt sustainable practices, like reducing methane emissions, enabling them to produce carbon credits.

We collect these credits and let you retire them, forever, via subscription on CleverCow.

The system allows farmers to monetise carbon credits they generate, speeding up adoption of sustainable practices, and lets you reduce your climate impact. Win, win!

YOUR CLEVERCOW SUBSCRIPTION

Offset your unavoidable carbon footprint.

With a CleverCow subscription, you can neutralise your personal carbon emissions and be part of the moo-vement in creating real and lasting change.

100% VERIFIED. 100% CERTIFIED. 100% BACKED BY SCIENCE.

We carefully select the producers and programs we work with. We only choose 100% verified sustainable farming projects that are seen to be making a lasting, consistent difference, so you can feel confident your support is creating true change.

Sourced exclusively from sustainable Australian farming methods
